ModMetaData.name: Effective Lumbering
ModMetaData.author: Vectorial1024
ModMetaData.description:
A very simple patch-mod that reduces the time required to sow trees. Work required to sow trees is now 2000, instead of 4000.
As a rule of thumb, it is unlikely that this mod will cause any problems with any future RW releases, but do tell me otherwise.
